did.abstract: Minutes of a Hearing of the Joint Legislative Committee on Industrial and Labor Conditions, held in the Assembly Parlog, the Capitol, Albany, NY, on January 28, 1963.

scopecontent.p: January 28, 1963. Photocopy of typescript minutes, includes copy of proposed bill on "Employee-Management Relations in Public Service." 129 pp.
